entry.title: [GRA7][PaaS] - New ralease
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 13, 17:00 UTC  -  Oct 14, 01:00 UTC

Sep 20, 20:11 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/10/2022 17:00 UTC
End time : 14/10/2022 01:00 UTC
Service impact : At one point each project will be reallocated resulting in a short interruption. Integrations and WebHooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that they will be doing an internal maintenance in order to release the latest features, bug fixes, and performance updates.

entry.title: [FR][Web Cloud] - Domains
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 30, 23:00 UTC  -  Oct 1, 18:00 UTC

Sep 22, 11:07 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 30/09/2022 23:00 UTC
End time : 01/10/2022 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Following a migration maintenance by Afnic that will entail all current operations on the .fr, .re, .yt, .pm, .tf and .wf domain names being unavailable. During this time, it will not be possible to:
=> Register or delete a .fr, .re, .yt, .pm, .tf or .wf domain name
=> Make changes to .fr, .re, .yt, .pm, .tf and .wf domain names (transfer, update contacts, update name servers, etc.)
We apologize for the inconvenience

Sep 23, 09:15 UTC

Service impacté : Nous avons un incident localisé sur les équipements de notre opérateur entraînant des perturbations de ligne.
Le département 50 est concerné.
Origine de l'incident: La problématique est lié à l'arrêt du flux de la part de l'opérateur historique.
Actions en cours : Les démarches sont en cours afin de rétablir les services. Nous revenons vers vous rapidement.

Sep 23, 08:50 UTC
